title: I'm Not Ashamed to Own My Lord

author.name: Isaac Watts
author.bio: Isaac Watts was an English Christian minister, hymn writer, theologian, and logician. He is credited with over 750 hymns, many of which are still in use today. 'I'm Not Ashamed to Own My Lord' is one of his enduring hymns.

lyrics:
1
I’m not ashamed to own my Lord,
Or to defend His cause;
Maintain the honour of His Word,
The glory of His cross.

Chorus:
At the Cross, at the cross,
Where I first saw the light,
And the burden of my heart
Rolled away
It was there by faith
I received my sight
And now I am happy all the way.

2
Jesus, my God, I know His name;
His name is all my trust;
Nor will He put my soul to shame,
Nor let my hope be lost.

3
Firm as His throne
His promise stands;
And He can well secure
What I’ve committed to His hands
Till the decisive hour.

4
Then will He own
My worthless name
Before His Father’s face;
And in the new Jerusalem
Appoint my soul a place.
